entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
